attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: even though the banks have given assurances to relax the regulations regarding what is acceptable identification in order to get an account however few have done this most banks will only accept a full valid uk driving licence, valid passport or strangely enough a dole card. i would like put it to you that this kind of regulation discremenates against hundreds of thousands of people who have plenty of other checkable id and yet refused access to accounts. and would invite others to sign up to this petition to get these regulations changed to ensure that the same service is offered to all and not just those who are fortunate enough to have the id nessecary to meet the present criteria.
